message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable item. I'm looking for $15000 for it.
I'm very interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9000.

I understand that $9000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I can meet you in the middle at $12500. This is my final offer, so I'd appreciate it if you could consider it seriously.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $12500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $10000 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10000. I can offer you a slight discount, but I need to get at least $11500 for the product. This is my final offer, so please let me know if it's acceptable to you.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $11500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $11000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get at least $12000 for the product. This is my last offer, so please let me know if it's acceptable to you.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $12000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. Can you consider this price?
